cause.description:
Advocates of Manifest Destiny believe that expansion is not only good, but that it was obvious ("manifest") and certain ("destiny").
NEW U.S. COLONIES (proposed)
-Darfur= New New Jersey
-Canada= Really Really North Dakota (once we run out of trees)
-The Iraqi Golf and Racket Club (Membership only)
- The Afghani Salon and Day Spa
1. Don't Mess with Texas
2. Being an American ensures security, prosperity, and human rights
3. The 3rd world always benefits from American intervention
4. Cuba Needs a Walmart and a few Bojangles
cause.mission: Make the world a more beautiful place
cause.name: Bring Back Manifest Destiny!
